attributes.action: treat unmarried siblings on the same footing as married couples or those in "civic partnerships for IHT purposes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Brothers and sisters that look after each other, share their lives together and for all intents and purposes live as a family should not be discriminated against when it comes to inheritance tax, but enjoy the same benefits as married couples and those in "civic partnerships"
